name: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia

phrases.name: dayman
phrases.message: [:nd] Day man! Ahhhh Ahh Ahhhhhhh! Fighter of the night man! Ahhhh Ahh Ahhhhhhh! Champion of the sun. Ahhhh Ahh Ahhhhhhh! Youre a master of karate and friendship for everyone!

phrases.name: donkey
phrases.message: [:nf] By the power of the commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Reid Mental Institution hereby decrees that Frank Reynolds to not have... Donkey brains.

phrases.name: ears
phrases.message: [:np] See I just realized that I have two ears, so it's a waste to only listen to one thing.

phrases.name: fhvpvqr
phrases.message: [:au] Vg ybbxf yvxr ur znl pbzzvg fhvpvqr! Fhvpvqr vf onq nff!

phrases.name: golden
phrases.message: [:nd] [m<500>]. I have contained my rage for as long as possible, but I shall unleash my fury upon you like the crashing of a thousand waves! Be-gone, vile man! Be-gone from me! A starter car? This car is a finisher car! A transporter of gods! The golden god! I am untethered, and my rage knows no bounds!

phrases.name: job
phrases.message: [:np] Oh, get a job? Just get a job? Why don't I strap on my job helmet and squeeze down into a job cannon and fire off into job land, where jobs grow on jobbies?

phrases.name: jot
phrases.message: [:nf] Well through god, all things are possible. So jot that down.

phrases.name: law
phrases.message: [:np] Lets go toe to toe in bird law, and see who comes out the victor.

phrases.name: mass
phrases.message: [:nf] We've been through this, I'm cultivating mass! [:nd] Stop saying that! You are not cultivating mass, and if you are, stop cultivating and start harvesting!

phrases.name: milk
phrases.message: [:np] I'll have the milk steak, boiled over hard, and a side of your finest jelly beans, raw.

phrases.name: nightcrawlers
phrases.message: [:np] Why do we never play night crawlers anymore, huh? [:nh] I don't know, Charlie!

phrases.name: penpx
phrases.message: [:aq] Uv. Hz, V'z n erpbirevat penpxurnq. Guvf vf zl ergneqrq fvfgre gung V gnxr pner bs. V'q yvxr fbzr jrysner cyrnfr.

phrases.message: [:ac] V'z n shyy-ba encvfg. Lbh xabj, nsevpnaf, qlfyrkvpf...gung fbeg bs guvat

phrases.name: qbat
phrases.message: [:au] Bbcf, V qebccrq zl zbafgre pbaqbz sbe zl zntahz qbat

phrases.name: roxie
phrases.message: [:au] Ebkvr, tbq oyrff lbh, lbh jrer n tbbq juber. Lbh freivprq zr yvxr ab bgure juber rire qvq, naq abg whfg zl penax....ohg zl urneg.

phrases.name: scar
phrases.message: [:ao] V zrna, qbrf zl fpne ybbx yvxr n qbt'f intvan? Lbh xabj? Znlor. V qba'g xabj. V'z abg tbaan fvg urer naq gel gb trg vafvqr gur zvaq bs n qbt.

phrases.name: science
phrases.message: [:ac] Fghcvq fpvrapr ovgpu, pbhyqa'g rira znxr V zber fznegre! [:au] Lrnu!

phrases.name: smell
phrases.message: [:aq] Guvax bs gur fzryy. Lbh unira'g gubhtug bs gur fzryy, lbh ovgpu!

phrases.name: smoke
phrases.message: [:np] Oh, I'm sorry. Well I could put the trash into a landfill where it's going to stay for millions of years, or I could burn it up, get a nice smokey smell in here and let that smoke go into the sky where it turns into stars.

phrases.name: spaghetti
phrases.message: [:np] What is this word spa? I feel like you're starting to say a word, and you're not finishing it. Are you trying to say spaghetti? Are you taking me on a spaghetti day?

phrases.name: tbq
phrases.message: [:ac] Urer'f n pbasrffvba: V'z va ybir jvgu n zna. Jung? V'z va ybir jvgu n zna! [_<250>] N zna pnyyrq Tbq. Qbrf gung znxr zr tnl? Nz V tnl sbe Tbq? Lbh orgpun.

phrases.name: tools
phrases.message: [:nd] Tools! Tools! Duct tape, zip ties, and gloves! I have to have my tools! I like to bind... I like to be bound!

phrases.name: troll
phrases.message: [:nh] You've got to pay the troll toll if you want to get into that boysoul, you've got to pay the troll toll to get in!

phrases.name: vietnam
phrases.message: [:nh] I didn't go to Vietnam so they could take my freedom. [:nu] You went to Vietnam in 1994 to open a sweat shop. [:nh] And a lot of good men died in that sweat shop!
phrases.help: We lost a lot of good men.

phrases.name: vote
phrases.message: [:nd] Hello fellow American. This you should vote me. I leave power. Good. Thank you, thank you. If you vote me, I'm hot. What? Taxes, they'll be lower... son. The Democratic vote for me is right thing to do Philadelphia, so do.

_voice_guide: Charlie: :np, Frank: :nh, Dennis: :nd, Mac: :nf, Dee: :nu, Cricket: :nb
